title: What you need to know about icons in the address bar on Google Chrome desktop
content:
As browsers go, Google Chrome is one that has a ton of features in plain sight, though it can be easy to forget about them. A few of those features are found right in the address bar. This guide will take you through the many icons you might find on the right of the address bar, as well as what they mean and do.

moreâ€¦

The post What you need to know about icons in the address bar on Google Chrome desktop appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Chrome can be an exceptional browser with the right know-how. This guide will explain the different Google Chrome icons and what they do.
